nodes.name: SlowWallet

nodes.documentation: Propose a new transfer, which can be confirmed after two weeks.
nodes.name: propose

devdoc.title: Time-delayed ERC-20 wallet contract. Can only transfer tokens after publicly recording the intention to do so at least four weeks in advance.

confirm(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Confirm and execute a proposed transfer, if enough time has passed since it was proposed.

propose(address,uint256,string).notice: Propose a new transfer, which can be confirmed after two weeks.
